co.cask.cdap.template.etl.api.batch

Interface BatchSourceContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AdapterContext, BatchContext, DatasetContext, TransformContext

    @Beta
public interface BatchSourceContext
extends BatchContext
    Context of a Batch Source.

      • setInput

        void setInput(String datasetName,
            Dataset dataset)
        Overrides the input configuration of this MapReduce job to write to the specified dataset instance.

        Currently, the dataset passed in must either be an InputFormatProvider or a BatchReadable. You may want to use this method instead of setInput(String, List) if your input dataset uses runtime arguments set in your own program logic. Input splits are determined either from the dataset instance if it is a BatchReadable or from the corresponding MapReduce InputFormat if the dataset instance is a InputFormatProvider.

        Parameters:
        datasetName - the name of the input dataset
        dataset - the input dataset
